attributes.additional_details:
Amani Khansia was born in England 06/09/09 where he lived with his mother Anisa Khansia. On the 05/06/11 mother and son arrived in Marmaris Turkey for a two week holiday so Amani could see his father and grandparents.
Cruelly Amani was taken from his mother who he has never spent a night apart from. Amani was taken by his father and grandmother.
Anisa does not know of her baby's where about or well being and father and grandmother refuses any contact.

Please show your support in signing this petition to help bring Amani home to his loving mother and family.
